requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: Any CPU from the last 5 years
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any graphics card with at least 6 GBs of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: Any CPU from the last 3 Years
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any graphics card with at least 8 GBs of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX650 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This app features keyboard controls and partial controller support with the Xbox One controller. Mouse/touch screen are not supported.
